title: 1 & 2 Thessalonians Week 3 with Jess Connolly
description:
Join Raechel and Amanda as they study Scripture with Jess Connolly, an author, original member of the She Reads Truth community, founder of the Go + Tell Gals, and leader of Bright City Church alongside her husband. How can we live in the abundance of the gospel here and now? What does it look like to reflect on God’s judgement in our own lives? And why doesn’t Instagram make a great pastor? Listen in to this week’s conversation as we answer these questions and more, closing out our time together in 1 & 2 Thessalonians.

Read with Us: 

This episode corresponds to Week 3 of the She Reads Truth 1 & 2 Thessalonians reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com. 

Shop the 1 & 2 Thessalonians collection at ShopSheReadsTruth.com. 

Show notes can be found at shereadstruth.com/podcast/1-2-thessalonians-week-3-with-jess-connolly
